parameters.name: InstanceIDs
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can enable auto-renewal for up to 100 subscription instances at a time. Separate multiple instance IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: RenewalPeriod
parameters.description:
The auto-renewal period. Valid values:

*   1
*   2
*   3
*   6
*   12

>  This parameter is required if the RenewalStatus parameter is set to AutoRenewal.

parameters.name: RenewalPeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the auto-renewal period. Valid values:

*   M: months
*   Y: years

>  This parameter is required if the RenewalStatus parameter is set to AutoRenewal.

parameters.name: RenewalStatus
parameters.description:
The status of renewal. Valid values:

*   AutoRenewal: The instance is automatically renewed.
*   ManualRenewal: The instance is manually renewed.
*   NotRenewal: The instance is not renewed.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Subscription: subscription
*   PayAsYouGo: pay-as-you-go
